## Rendered by GT

```{python}
#| code-fold: true

from great_tables import GT, md, html
import duckdb

query= """
  SELECT * FROM read_csv_auto('resources/gt_input.csv')
  """

table = duckdb.query(query).df()

GT(table,locale="it-IT",rowname_col="Cat")
```
